title: Go is toooooooooooooooooo coward. In order to save your time, stop the project or be braver!
body:
by **limao520**: 
No comany ( maybe except Google itself) would like to trasfer their 
programming languages to another new lanuge with very little change!

Then no college would teach their students such programming langage.

Nowadays, the programming language should deal with the most important
